text:
Jeremy Alexis - Vice Provost for Academic Strategy, Associate Professor of Innovation - alexis@illinoistech.edu
Paul R. Anderson - Adjunct Professor, Environmental Engineering - andersonp@illinoistech.edu
Hamid Arastoopour - Henry R. Linden Endowed Chair in Engineering, Director of the Wanger Institute for Sustainable Energy Research (WISER), Affiliate Professor, Stuart School of Business - arastoopour@illinoistech.edu
Kristina N. Bauer - Associate Chair, Department of Psychology, Associate Professor of Psychology - kbauer1@illinoistech.edu
Mustafa Bilgic - Chair, Department of Computer Science, Professor of Computer Science, Program Director, Master of Artificial Intelligence - mbilgic@illinoistech.edu
John F. O. Bilson - Professor Emeritus of Finance - bilson@illinoistech.edu
Britt Burton-Freeman - Professor, Food Science and Nutrition, Chair, Department of Food Science and Nutrition, Director, Center for Nutrition Research - bburton@illinoistech.edu
Roland Calia - Associate Dean of Assessment and Recruitment, Director of Master of Public Administration, Director of M.S. in Sustainability Analytics and Management, Director of M.S. in Project Management, Industry Professor of Public Administration - rcalia@illinoistech.edu
Patrick Corrigan - Distinguished Professor of Psychology - corrigan@illinoistech.edu
Jason J. Czarnezki - Dean, Professor of Law, Frank Gunsaulus Faculty Fellow in Law - jczarnezki@illinoistech.edu
James R. Dabbert - Associate Teaching Professor of Applied Linguistics and Humanities - dabbert@illinoistech.edu
Carol Davids - Research Assistant Professor Professor, Computer Science, Founding Director, Real-Time Communications Lab - davids@illinoistech.edu
Maurice E. Dawson - Associate Professor, Director, Center for Cyber Security and Forensics Education - mdawson2@illinoistech.edu
Dirk S. Denison - Professor, MCHAP Director - denison@illinoistech.edu
Natacha DePaola - Professor of Biomedical Engineering, Director IDMET (Illinois Tech Digital Medical Engineering and Technology Research and Education Center), Director 3DEXPERIENCE Education Center of Excellence in the Life Sciences - ndepaola@illinoistech.edu
Jennifer deWinter - Dean, Lewis College of Science and Letters, Professor, Department of Humanities - jdewinter@illinoistech.edu
Nicole Ditchman - Professor of Psychology - nditchma@illinoistech.edu
Steff Du Bois - Associate Professor of Psychology - sdubois@illinoistech.edu
Indika Edirisinghe - Professor of Food Science and Nutrition, Associate Director/Center for Nutrition Research - iedirisi@illinoistech.edu
Robert Ellis - Associate Professor of Applied Mathematics, Program Director, Bachelor of Science in Data Science - ellisr@illinoistech.edu
David A. Erickson - Director of the Trial Advocacy Program, Co-Director of the Program in Criminal Litigation, Teaching Professor - derickson@illinoistech.edu
Frank C. Flury - Associate Professor, Director, Bachelor of Architecture Program - flury@illinoistech.edu
Laura Forlano - Associate Professor - lforlano@illinoistech.edu
Lance Fortnow - Dean, College of Computing, Professor Computer Science - lfortnow@illinoistech.edu
Gongkang Fu - Professor of Civil and Architectural Engineering - gfu2@illinoistech.edu
Jeremy Hajek - Industry Associate Professor, Information Technology and Management, Graduate and Undergraduate Advisor - hajek@illinoistech.edu
Carrie M. Hall - Professor, Associate Dean for Undergraduate Affairs, Armour College of Engineering - chall9@illinoistech.edu
Ronald E. Henderson - Professor - rhender1@illinoistech.edu
Steven J. Heyman - Professor of Law - sheyman@illinoistech.edu
Elisabeth Hildt - Professor of Philosophy, Director of the Center for the Study of Ethics in the Professions - ehildt@illinoistech.edu
Hao Huang - Associate Professor of Social Sciences - hhuang48@illinoistech.edu
Behzad Imanian - Research Assistant Professor, Leader of IFSH HTS Initiative - bimanian@illinoistech.edu
Patrick R. Ireland - Professor of Political Science - pireland@illinoistech.edu
Oscar Juarez - Associate Professor of Biology, Biochemistry Steering Committee Member - ojuarez@illinoistech.edu
Sang Baum “Solomon” Kang - Assistant Director, Undergraduate Programs in Business, Associate Professor of Finance - skang21@illinoistech.edu
Sean Keller - Associate Professor, Associate Dean for Strategic Initiatives - skeller1@illinoistech.edu
Carly A. Kocurek - Professor of Digital Humanities and Media Studies, Director of Game Design and Experiential Media, Associate Dean of Academic Programs in Lewis College of Science and Letters, Humanities Graduate Program Director - ckocurek@illinoistech.edu
Harold J. Krent - Professor of Law - hkrent@illinoistech.edu
Reed Kroloff - Dean, Rowe Family College of Architecture Dean Endowed Chair - 
Anita K. Krug - Professor of Law - akrug2@illinoistech.edu
Eva Kultermann - Associate Professor, Associate Dean of University and Academic Affairs - kultermann@illinoistech.edu
Frank J. Lane - Associate Professor of Psychology - lane@illinoistech.edu
Jonathon E. Larson - Associate Professor of Psychology, Chair, Department of Psychology, Executive Director, Center for Research and Service - larsonjon@illinoistech.edu
Alvin Lee - Associate Professor, Food Science and Nutrition - alee33@illinoistech.edu
Nicole Legate - Associate Professor - nlegate@illinoistech.edu
Zongzhi Li - Professor of Civil and Architectural Engineering, Director of Transportation Engineering and Infrastructure Engineering and Management - lizz@illinoistech.edu
Martin H. Malin - Professor of Law Emeritus - mmalin@illinoistech.edu
Yuri Mansury - Professor of Social Sciences - ymansury@illinoistech.edu
Yuanbing Mao - Associate Dean, Lewis College of Science and Letters, Professor of Chemistry - ymao17@illinoistech.edu
Nancy S. Marder - Professor of Law, Director of the Justice John Paul Stevens Jury Center, Co-Director of the Institute for Law and the Humanities - nmarder@illinoistech.edu
